00126 class properties_bundle
00127 {
00130 public:
00131     typedef std::string                     string_type;
00132     typedef properties_bundle               class_type;
00133 private:
00134 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE
00135     typedef platformstl::properties_file    map_type_;
00136     typedef char const*                     map_init_type_;
00137 #else /* ? FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE */
00138     typedef std::map<
00139         string_type
00140     ,   string_type
00141     >                                       map_type_;
00142     typedef map_type_ const                 map_init_type_;
00143 #endif /* FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE */
00145 
00148 public:
00149     enum
00150     {
00151             ignoreCaseOnLookup  =   0x01
00152         ,   treatSourceAsMemory =   0x02
00153     };
00155 
00158 public:
00159     explicit properties_bundle(char const *source);
00160 
00161     template <typename S>
00162     explicit properties_bundle(S const& source)
00163         : m_properties(open_ns_(source))
00164     {}
00165 
00166     ~properties_bundle() throw();
00168 
00171 public:
00172     string_type operator [](char const* name) const throw(std::out_of_range);
00173     template <typename S>
00174     string_type operator [](S const& name) const throw(std::out_of_range)
00175     {
00176         FASTFORMAT_DECLARE_c_str_ptr_();
00177 
00178         return operator [](FASTFORMAT_INVOKE_c_str_ptr_(FASTFORMAT_INVOKE_c_str_ptr_(name)));
00179     }
00181 
00184 private:
00185     // We have to have this funky level of indirection due to DMC++ and GCC compilers'
00186     // weird behaviour wrt handling shims' fully qualified names in templates.
00187     template <typename S>
00188     static map_init_type_ open_ns_(S const& source)
00189     {
00190         FASTFORMAT_DECLARE_c_str_ptr_();
00191 
00192         return open_(FASTFORMAT_INVOKE_c_str_ptr_(source));
00193     }
00194 
00195     static map_init_type_ const open_(char const *name);
00197 
00200 private:
00201     map_type_ const m_properties;
00203 
00206 private:
00207     properties_bundle(class_type const&);
00208     class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00210 };
00211 
00212 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00213  * Implementation
00214  */
00215 
00216 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00217 
00218 inline /* static */ properties_bundle::map_init_type_ const properties_bundle::open_(char const *name)
00219 {
00220 # ifdef FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE
00221 
00222     return name;
00223 
00224 # else /* ? FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE */
00225 
00226     std::string     line;
00227     std::ifstream   stm(name);
00228     map_type_       map;
00229 
00230     if(!stm)
00231     {
00232 // TODO: Define (and thoroughly unit-test) a FastFormat-specific exception, and use that instead
00233 
00234         throw std::runtime_error("properties file not found");
00235     }
00236 
00237     for(; std::getline(stm, line); )
00238     {
00239         std::string name;
00240         std::string value;
00241 
00242         stlsoft::trim_all(line);
00243 
00244         if(stlsoft::split(line, '=', name, value))
00245         {
00246             stlsoft::trim_all(name);
00247             stlsoft::trim_left(value);
00248 
00249             map[name] = value;
00250         }
00251     }
00252 
00253     return map;
00254 
00255 # endif /* FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE */
00256 }
00257 
00258 inline properties_bundle::properties_bundle(char const *source)
00259     : m_properties(open_(source))
00260 {}
00261 
00262 inline properties_bundle::~properties_bundle() throw()
00263 {}
00264 
00265 inline properties_bundle::string_type properties_bundle::operator [](char const *name) const throw(std::out_of_range)
00266 {
00267 # ifdef FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE
00268 
00269     map_type_::view_type const value = m_properties[name];
00270 
00271     return string_type(value.data(), value.size());
00272 
00273 # else /* ? FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE */
00274 
00275     map_type_::const_iterator it = m_properties.find(name);
00276 
00277     if(it == m_properties.end())
00278     {
00279         throw std::out_of_range("format string not found");
00280     }
00281 
00282     return (*it).second;
00283 
00284 # endif /* FASTFORMAT_PROPERTIES_BUNDLE_USE_STLSOFT_1_10_PROPERTIES_FILE */
00285 }
00286 
00287 #endif /* FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
